summary: The diff implements foundational user profile management with credit score and deposit tracking in the backend, plus frontend UI components for deposit confirmation, dispute voting, and appeal submission. However, critical backend logic is missing: no ICP Ledger integration, no quest data model, no automated reward distribution, no dispute resolution system, and no state machine. Most frontend components are placeholders awaiting backend implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Integrate ICP Ledger Canister to enable real ICP token transfers for all bounty deposits, rewards, and platform fees
missing_requirements.reason: No ICP Ledger integration code found in backend. No canister-to-canister calls, no e8s conversion logic for actual transfers, no deposit locking mechanism on-chain

missing_requirements.requirement: Create automated reward distribution system with 6% platform fee deduction and atomic transfers
missing_requirements.reason: No backend implementation for 24-hour auto-release timer, no platform fee calculation, no atomic transfer logic, no reward distribution system

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement three-tier dispute resolution system with weighted voting and appeal tiers
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has no dispute resolution logic, no voting system, no weighted vote calculations, no appeal tier tracking, no auto-release timer implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Extend quest data model to include deposit amount, dispute status, voting records, appeal submissions, and auto-release timer with state machine
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has no quest data model at all. No quest creation, tracking, or state machine implementation found

missing_requirements.requirement: Build community voting interface for dispute resolution with real-time vote weights and duplicate vote prevention
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend DisputeVoting component is a placeholder with hardcoded data. No backend voting logic, no duplicate vote prevention, no vote weight calculation

missing_requirements.requirement: Create appeal submission interface with 100-character minimum and evidence attachment capability
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend AppealSubmission component has no backend integration. Form exists but submissions are not stored or processed

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Quest Card component to display required deposit and trigger ICP Ledger deposit collection before locking contract
missing_requirements.reason: QuestCard shows calculated deposit but has no actual ICP transfer implementation. DepositConfirmationDialog has placeholder logic only

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement deposit penalty reset mechanism for quest abandonment or dispute loss
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has no logic to detect quest abandonment, no dispute outcome tracking, no penalty reset mechanism
